result.eng: The company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ga: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann

result.html: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an coṁlaċt táirgí áiriṫe a ċur ċun cinn ar ṁargaḋ na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.

result.eng: The hotel looks good, let's book it.
result.ga: Tá cuma na maitheasa ar an óstán cuirimis in áirithe é

result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na maiṫeasa ar an óstán cuirimis in áiriṫe éThe hotel looks good, let's book it.

result.eng: Certain people are of the opinion that...

result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.
result.ga: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe

result.ponchtml: Tá siad de ẛíor ina gceap magaiḋ ag daoine áiriṫeSome people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
